text: Kerstin Anita Marianne Ekberg (29 September 1931 11 January 2015) was a Swedish actress. She was born in Malmö, Skåne. She was best known for her role in the movie La Dolce Vita (1960), which was directed by Federico Fellini. Ekberg died from a long-illness in Castelli Romani, Italy, aged 83. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Disease-related deaths in Italy Category:Actors from Malmö Category:Swedish models Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths
title: Anita Ekberg
